<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Whisper of the First Lie](/Equipment.aspx?ID=471)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 617 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 60,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This delicate necklace contains bottled whispers distilled from a source on the Astral Plane rumored to be connected to the first lie ever told. While wearing the necklace, you gain a +3 item bonus to Deception checks, and you can attempt to counteract effects that would force you to tell the truth or determine whether you are lying. Success on this counteract attempt lets you ignore the effect, rather than removing the effect entirely. The counteract level is 9, with a counteract modifier of +35.

<document level="2" id="action-283" />

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of _fabricated truth_.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Whisper of the First Lie
